HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave ovisi o masi i obujmu pošiljke, a definira se u procesu kreiranja narudžbe.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Isporuka unutar 10 radnih dana ako je roba dostupna na skladištu dobavljača u Hrvatskoj.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava se ne vrši na sve otoke. Cijena dostave za otoke i područje Dubrovačko-neretvanske županije je 50% veća od cijene dostave za ostatak Hrvatske. Za otoke na koje se ne dostavlja, pošiljku je potrebno preuzeti u navedenom terminalu dostavne službe.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave ovisi o masi i obujmu pošiljke, a definira se u procesu kreiranja narudžbe.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Isporuka unutar 10 radnih dana ako je roba dostupna na skladištu dobavljača u Hrvatskoj.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava se ne vrši na sve otoke. Cijena dostave za otoke i područje Dubrovačko-neretvanske županije je 50% veća od cijene dostave za ostatak Hrvatske. Za otoke na koje se ne dostavlja, pošiljku je potrebno preuzeti u navedenom terminalu dostavne službe.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only specified option for online orders. Delivery is available throughout Croatia, including for bulky items. No specific courier providers are named. PRICING: Shipping cost is calculated during checkout based on the order's weight and volume. There is no mention of a free shipping threshold. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is not available to all Croatian islands. For islands and the Dubrovnik-Neretva county, the shipping cost is 50% higher. For islands where direct delivery is not possible, customers must pick up their order at a designated courier terminal. Delivery is to the first obstacle (e.g., building entrance) and does not include carrying items upstairs. NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery is available and does not incur a surcharge. Express and weekend delivery are not mentioned. In-store pickup, parcel shops, and parcel lockers are not listed as delivery methods for online orders. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is somewhat basic. Key details like courier names and a clear list of islands with restricted delivery are missing. The 50% surcharge for certain areas is clearly stated, but the base shipping cost is only visible during checkout.
